resources.string:
A work of two guys who wanted to do something in their summer other than just sitting vile and wasting their time. :P 
They are none other than 
Irfan Mohammad and Naga Chandra.



This is FolksWallet 1.0, the Beta release. We assure you many more improvements in the future versions. Please support us by using the app and do let us know where we can improve.


Do write to us at nafri.irfan96@hotmail.com
